title: Pickle Logo
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with the neon yellow Pickle logo

title: Hamburger menu
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with the hamburger menu in the top right corner

title: Search bar
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected:
THEN user is displayed with the search bar 
AND'Guess today's mystery player' copy is displayed in the search bar

title: 'Pick for me' CTA
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with the 'Pick for me' cta

title: Grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN web app is opened on browser
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user opens the Pickle game
custom_expected: THEN user is displayed with the 'team', 'lg./div', 'b', 't', 'born', 'age', 'pos.' columns and 9 horizontal sections
